ComicInfo.Summary:
The popular Danger Zone team-up event series returns!! Zombie Tramp, Vampblade, and DollFace come together again, and this time they’re forced into battle… in space! When a new cosmic threat plucks the girls from Earth and places them into their galactic combat arena, can our lethal ladies measure up against the baddest gladiators from across the cosmos??
The next Zombie Tramp universe crossover starts here, with covers from some of the series’ hottest artists (each with their own risqué variant as well)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young (a) & Marcelo Costa (c) | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young (a) & Marcelo Costa (c) | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marcelo Costa | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Costa | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Bill McKay (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | 5 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Bill McKay (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | 6 | G | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 7 | H | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 8 |
